result.title: Need help with Codeforces Round #277.5 (Div. 2) problem C
result.content: Good morning, today I stumbled across this problem which I could not solve it looks really easy but I couldn't. I read the Tutorial but still didn't get it if you can explain this problem to me or at least give me the code to understand on my own I would be very greatful thanks in advance. the link to the problem is here
